Review.Titre: Doesn't get much better then Sugarsweeps
Review.Contenu: Okay so after reading some of these reviews I'd like to set some things straight. It seems a lot like people are basically losing all their money and then blaming sugar sweeps. When like they have said now in response to every bad review - they do not own the gaming softwares they just give you a way to shuffle your money through these different softwares and redeem if you happen to win. I have seriously been using them for a year or so now and they are fantastic! They are 24/7, fast as hell deposits/redeems/withdrawls, 24/7 chat support, easy to use site w pretty straightforward features (I.E deposit, redeem, withdrawal, transactions etc), not too complicated. They are not perfect -obviously but they're pretty much always trying to improve one thing or another. I get frustrated sometimes when they remove the cash app option since Bitcoin fees are so outrageous right now, and also bc the cash app option allows for deposits of any amount such as $1, $2, 5, etc whereas depositing via Bitcoin is $10 minimum but they keep bringing it back so I'm happy 👍Oh and they don't steal anyone's money or block the chat feature lmao. Sometimes their chat system glitches I've noticed or they have to reboot etc etc like I said they aren't perfect but it's always resolved quickly and it doesn't happen often. Thanks sugarsweeps!!!
